title: Monetizing Your Passion: When to Charge!
description:
So when is the right time to start charging for your services beyond offering freebies? Well today lets discuss a few updates from MyAICoFounder, the platform changing the way we work with AI and talk about the need to charge for your services and when it's right.

Check it out: https://myaicofounder.com/

ðŸ“ˆ Subscribe for more analysis on the evolving landscapes and more. Hit the bell for notifications on our latest videos.

ðŸ’¡ Like and share to spark a conversation on the future of the channel, our discussions and where this journey goes.

#ai #business #money #passion
